ygData.subject: Faction with trolls, and spore guardian quest
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe when you do the bone chip quest for hukulk, you get increased faction with da bashers, and troll sk.  you also get lowered faction with
ygData.messageBody:
i believe when you do the bone chip quest for hukulk, you
get increased faction with da bashers, and troll sk. you
also get lowered faction with greenbloods(ogre sks?) and
ogre warriors. i never seen the spore guardian, but i
have heard shouts of him killing a bunch of newbies, who
wanted me to find him. unfortunately i couldnt. however,
i bought the head off of someone, and the prize is pretty
decent. i bought it for 15 gold, and got the mask and 5
gold upon completion. then i sold my leather mask i was
wearing, and got 2 plat, so i actually made money by
buying the head! the mask itself isnt great, it is same
ac as leather, with +2 to dex and int.
gugbug, lvl 11 troll sk
povar
